sentences.en: Australian python with a variegated pattern on its back.
sentences.cn: 背部有斑驳的图案的澳大利亚蟒.

sentences.en: Crown variegated dark green, yellow and beige, plain. Miniature.
sentences.cn: 深绿色, 黄色和灰褐色组合成的皇冠斑叶, 一般型叶. 迷你型.

sentences.en: Crown variegated green, white and pink , plain , ovate. Semiminiature trailer.
sentences.cn: 绿色, 白色,粉红色组合成的皇冠状斑叶, 叶面平坦. 半迷你悬垂型.

sentences.en: Flowers on variegated branches yield offspring that have variegated foliage.
sentences.cn: 有斑驳的枝条上的花,产生有变异叶片的后代.

sentences.en: Infected lungs are firm, nodular and variegated color.
sentences.cn: 感染的肺脏坚实 、 结节状、五颜六色.

sentences.en: Semidouble dark blue - purple frilled Large. Variegated dark green and pink. Standard.
sentences.cn: 半重瓣深色的蓝到深紫色大朵折边花. 深绿色和粉红色组合成的斑叶. 标准型.

sentences.en: That is a character strangely variegated with good and evil.
sentences.cn: 那是一种善恶奇异地交织着的性格.

sentences.en: The leaves are a variegated red.
sentences.cn: 这些树叶呈斑驳的红色。

sentences.en: They are also found in the non - chlorophyllous tissues of variegated leaves.
sentences.cn: 它们也可在杂斑叶片的 非 绿色组织中找到.

sentences.en: This plant has beautifully variegated leaves.
sentences.cn: 这种植物的叶子色彩斑驳,非常美丽.

sentences.en: TL variegated dark green, heart - shaped, quilted , glossy, scalloped. Standard.
sentences.cn: 深绿色的TL型斑叶, 凹凸叶面光滑, 贝壳叶型.标准型.

sentences.en: Variegated dark green, rose, plum and white, heart - shaped. Large.
sentences.cn: 深绿色, 玫瑰色, 梅子色和白色组合成的心型斑叶.大型.

sentences.en: Variegated green and cream, plain , pointed. Sucker propagation. Semiminiature.
sentences.cn: 绿色和奶油色组合成的尖型斑叶, 叶面平坦.只能用芽繁殖. 半迷你型.

sentences.en: We're going to grow a variegated ivy up the back of the house.
sentences.cn: 我们打算在房子后面种一棵杂色常春藤.

words.tran_cn: 各种各样颜色的；杂色的，五颜六色的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
变化；[生物] 变异，变种
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
使多样化，使丰富多彩；使成杂色
[生物]杂色的；斑驳的；富于变化的

trans.tran_cn: 杂色的，斑驳的，变化多端的
trans.tran_en: a variegated plant, leaf etc has different coloured marks on it

trans.tran_cn: 使成杂色(variegate的过去式和过去分词)
